fields.summary: Change to commons.osgi.symbolicName in commons-parent 47 produces incompatible OSGi Bundles

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
In contrast to version 3.7.0 the BundleSymbolicName changed erroneously in 3.8.0 to:
{code:java}
org.apache.commons.commons-lang3{code}
 

As this breaks existing installations the change should be reverted and a new version with OSGi support should be released.

comments.body:
I tried mingling with the bnd-plugin configuration but it didn't help to correct the META-data:
{code:java}
diff --git a/pom.xml b/pom.xml
index ff00abca..9ac95673 100644
--- a/pom.xml
+++ b/pom.xml
@@ -666,6 +666,14 @@
             <skip>false</skip>
           </configuration>
         </plugin>
+        <plugin>
+          <groupId>org.apache.felix</groupId>
+          <artifactId>maven-bundle-plugin</artifactId>
+          <version>3.5.0</version>
+          <configuration>
+            <Bundle-SymbolicName>org.apache.commons.lang3</Bundle-SymbolicName>
+          </configuration>
+        </plugin>
       </plugins>
     </pluginManagement>
     <plugins>
@@ -742,8 +750,14 @@
           <excludeFilterFile>${basedir}/spotbugs-exclude-filter.xml</excludeFilterFile>
         </configuration>
       </plugin>
+      <plugin>
+        <groupId>org.apache.felix</groupId>
+        <artifactId>maven-bundle-plugin</artifactId>
+        <configuration>
+          <Bundle-SymbolicName>org.apache.commons.lang3</Bundle-SymbolicName>
+        </configuration>
+      </plugin>
     </plugins>
-
   </build>

   <reporting>{code}
Thanks for rolling out v3.8.1 which fixed our OSGi setup again.
